transmissions.text: Voss... if you can hear this... the signal came from beyond the static wall. They're not what we thought they were. The machines remember everything.
Automated defense grid activated. All sectors report hostile contact. Epoch protocol is now in effect. There is no retreat.
01001000 01000101 01001100 01010000... They decoded it as 'HELP' but it was sent from the future. From us. From what we become.
The Scrotum Engine is operating beyond theoretical limits. The gravitational harmonics... they're not random. Someone is playing them like an instrument.
This is Voss from Epoch 3. Do not trust the transmissions. Do not trust this one. Keep flying. The only way out is through.
In memory of those who reached the edge and chose to look. The stars did not blink. The stars stared back.
We found the first one buried in the permafrost. A machine older than language. It was already running. It had been running since January 1st, 1970.
BUILD NOTE: If player reaches this level, physics engine is holding. Increase scrotum coefficient by 0.3 and monitor for oscillation.
